verses.text: Sing \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w our|strong="H5921"\w* strength; make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* joyful noise \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Jacob.
Lift up \w a|strong="H3068"\w* song, strike \w the|strong="H7321"\w* tambourine, play \w the|strong="H7321"\w* sweet-sounding harp \w and|strong="H3290"\w* lyre.

\w Sound|strong="H2172"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ram’s horn \w at|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* New Moon, \w and|strong="H3658"\w* \w at|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* full moon \w on|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* day \w of|strong="H5035"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* Feast.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* statute \w for|strong="H3117"\w* Israel, \w an|strong="H8628"\w* ordinance \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Jacob.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* ordained \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* testimony \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Joseph \f + \fr 81:5 \ft Or in Joseph\f* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w went|strong="H3478"\w* out over \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H4941"\w* Egypt, where \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w heard|strong="H3588"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* unfamiliar language:

“\w I|strong="H5921"\w* relieved \w his|strong="H7760"\w* shoulder \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* burden; \w his|strong="H7760"\w* hands \w were|strong="H4714"\w* freed \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* basket.

\w You|strong="H3709"\w* called \w out|strong="H5674"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* distress, \w and|strong="H3709"\w* I rescued \w you|strong="H3709"\w*; I answered \w you|strong="H3709"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* cloud \w of|strong="H3709"\w* thunder; I tested \w you|strong="H3709"\w* \w at|strong="H3709"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* waters \w of|strong="H3709"\w* Meribah.\f + \fr 81:7 \ft Meribah means quarreling; see Exodus 17:7.\f* Selah

\w Hear|strong="H6030"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H5921"\w* people, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* warn \w you|strong="H5921"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Israel, if only \w you|strong="H5921"\w* would listen \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*!

There \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3478"\w* strange god \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w*, nor \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w* bow \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foreign god.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w who|strong="H2114"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w up|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* Egypt. Open wide \w your|strong="H1961"\w* mouth, \w and|strong="H7812"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* fill \w it|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* people \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* listen \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Me|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Israel \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5927"\w* obey \w Me|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w gave|strong="H8085"\w* \w them|strong="H8085"\w* up \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* stubborn hearts \w to|strong="H3478"\w* follow \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* devices.
If only \w My|strong="H7971"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w* would listen \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Me|strong="H7971"\w*, if Israel would \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w My|strong="H7971"\w* ways,

\w how|strong="H8085"\w* soon \w I|strong="H8085"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* subdue \w their|strong="H8085"\w* enemies \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w turn|strong="H5971"\w* \w My|strong="H8085"\w* hand \w against|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* foes!

\w Those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H6862"\w* hate \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H6862"\w* feign obedience, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* doom \w would|strong="H6862"\w* last forever.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H6256"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* feed \w you|strong="H8130"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* finest wheat; \w with|strong="H3068"\w* honey \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* rock \w I|strong="H6256"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* satisfy \w you|strong="H8130"\w*.”
